data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Québec, Canada so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Québec, Canada
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 601,987 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 601,987 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Québec access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Mongol, Khalka people. 1.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Québec, Canada, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Québec to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary:
the state of Québec, Canada has a population of 7,730,600.

We estimate Québec has 601,987 people who might know Jesus, 4,900,721 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,227,892 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Québec, Canada from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
